attributes.action: Deploy specialist officers in mobile phone theft hot spot areas.
attributes.additional_details: This persistent theft of mobile phones across London is causing distress amongst citizens. It is giving a very bad name to London internationally. We are a laughing stock for global investors and tourists when it comes to law and order. This is affecting the decisions of investors globally.
attributes.background: Parliament should pass a law to deploy specialist officers in areas such as Oxford Street and make example of thieves robbing phones in the streets.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You can also contact your local London Assembly Members about this issue. You can find out who they are and how to contact them here: https://www.london.gov.uk/who-we-are/what-london-assembly-does/london-assembly-members
